summary: Either you make decisions or life makes them for you. For an ex-con struggling to go straight, the temptation of money, women and power prove too much, especially when his best friend promises him an easy heist.
cast: Samuel Le Bihan|Samy Naceri|Clotilde Courau|Marie Guillard|Michel Duchaussoy|Philippe Nahon|Francis Renaud|Lucien Jean-Baptiste|Bibi Naceri|David Saracino|Adrien Saint-Joré|Frédéric Pellegeay|Jean-Pierre Lazzerini|Stéphane Ferrara|Thierry Perkins-Lyautey|Edith Scob|Elisabeth Macocco|Mohamed Ahaouari|Elisabeth Margoni|Mohamed Damraoui|Richard Baque|Rachid Chanana|Samir Guesmi|Marc Samuel|Chloé Mons|Linda Sanchez|Nabil Debouze|Paco Boublard|Marc Dubreuil|Ridha Oubrik|Chantal Garrigues|Frédéric Maranber|Françoise Michaud|Sally Mekki|Jean-Marie Paris|Cédric Delsaux|Rémy Roubakha|Smaïl Mekki|Alexander Koumpan|Christine Chansou|Wanda Naceri|Sacha Naceri|Alain de Moyencourt|Hassan Koubba|François Berléand

title: El código
